Content:: The vice president of Federated States of Micronesia is the second highest position in Federated States of Micronesia. The vice president is also a part of the legislature. The annual salary of the vice president is set to US$70,000.[1] The history of the office holders is as follows:[2]  This Federated States of Micronesia article is a stub.
